parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the diagnostic metric set.

parameters.description: The IDs of the diagnostic metric sets.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
